telephony_group_manage_contacts_change_s: Your change of contact request has been sent.
telephony_group_manage_contacts_change_i:
With contact management, you can assign rights to other people and entrust them with the management of a line, alias or group.
The permissions vary depending on the contact type chosen:

Administrator contact: the designated administrator contact can manage the technical aspects of a line and assign “technical contact” permissions to another person.
Technical contact: the designated technical contact only manages the technical aspects of a line, alias or group.
Billing contact: the designated billing contact only manages billing (bill payment, etc.).
